title: Vase And Cover, ""US 5080"", designed 1951, produced 1977
creditline: Gift of J. and L. Lobmeyr
description:
Housing recommended
Clear, thin-walled cylindrical vase (a) curved and everted toward lip, rests on thin stem above slightly conical circular foot.  Circular cover (b) shaped to fit within lip of vase; finial comprised of thin stem surmounted by shaped flattened knop which repeats shape of cover.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase And Cover, ""US 5080"", designed 1951, produced 1977.
designed 1951, produced 1977. Glass. Gift of J. and L. Lobmeyr. 1978-186-1-a,b.
